title: Monthly Expenses
prompt:
Create a spreadsheet showing monthly expenses with the following items:
- Rent: $1200
- Food: $400
- Transport: $200

Include a Total row that calculates the sum of all expenses using a formula.

assertions.name: Total is correct
assertions.description: Total should equal the sum of all expenses (1800)

formulaRequirements.description: Total uses a formula, not hard-coded value

formattingRequirements.description: All expense amounts should have currency formatting

metadata.author: Benchmark System
metadata.notes: Basic level test to verify simple formula usage and structure-agnostic verification
